CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946 reads: "Local Dance Planners - Pictured above are the planning committee of the "back to school prom" being held at the Centre Avenue "Y" Friday, Sept. 6. Seated, left to right, are: Shirley Baxter, Sarah Bailey, Rose Marie Robinson, Frazura Bailey; standing: Walter Crocker, Betty Hord, Henry Burwell, Yvonne Hall, Mike Adams and Jesse Holiday. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of dance planning committee members, from left, seated: Shirley Baxter, Sarah Bailey, Rose Marie Robinson, and Frazura Bailey; standing: Walter Crocker, Betty Hord, Henry Burwell, Yvonne Hall, Mike Adams, and Jesse Holiday, gathered behind table in Centre Avenue YMCA
